newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Gulf rig unchanged at 164 in week.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Gulf rig unchanged at 164 in week.

text.p: There were 164 rigs under contract in the U.S. Gulf as of September 27, unchanged from the prior week, Offshore Data Services said.
The utilization rate for rigs working in the Gulf, based on a total fleet of 180, was 91.1 percent.
The number of working rigs in European/Mediterranean rose by one this week to 103 rigs under contract out of a total fleet of 103, a utilization rate of 100 percent.
The worldwide rig count rose by one to 560 out of a total fleet of 606, making the utilization rate 92.4 percent.
